Item.name: editor_tabs

Item.html_code:
<span id="ITEM_INFO_INTERNAL_SPAN"/>
<script>
  populate_ITEM_INFO_INTERNAL_SPAN = function()
  {
    document.getElementById("ITEM_INFO_INTERNAL_SPAN").innerHTML = aras.uiDrawItemInfoTable(document.itemType);
    //aras.uiPopulateInfoTableWithItem(document.item, document);
    var tbl = document.getElementById("itemInfoTable");
    tbl.style.display = "none";
    var title = document.getElementById("label_span");
    title.innerHTML = "View Card Editor";
  }

window.addEventListener("load", populate_ITEM_INFO_INTERNAL_SPAN);

</script>
